name: Rechargeable Camping Light with Stand, Outdoor LED Cordless Work Light with Portable Telescopic Bracket, 6AH Battery, 2000 Lumen Construction Lights with Carrying Bag
short_description: Built-in Battery and USB-C Charging Port: This rechargeable work light has a built-in 6000 mAh rechargeable battery with 5-50 hours of strong light-low light operating time, which is enough to meet the needs of most outdoor work. This LED work light adopts USB Type-C 5V2A charging interface, the maximum charging time is 8 hours, support power output, convenient for powering mobile devices.

Triangular Brackets and Telescopic Poles: This rechargeable LED work light with stand comes with a detachable folding tripod, which is suitable for all kinds of complicated working scenes. The main pole is retractable and can extend up to 3.7ft, you can adjust the height freely according to your work needs to meet different work requirements.

LED Heads and Dimmable Light Sources: The cordless work light has an XHP50 LED bead in the head and 3 COB light source boards with a maximum brightness of 2000 lumens and a main light range of 328-656ft.The main light has 3 adjustable modes: strong light.weak light and fast flash,and the COB light source boards have 7 adjustable modes:strong white light,weak white light,strong yellow light,weak yellow light,white light and yellow light at the same time,red light is always on,red light is flashing.

Mode of Operation and Angle of Adjustment: The led work light with stand has two buttons, the left button to adjust the main light, the right button to adjust the COB light source plate, easy to operate, so that you can quickly enter the work state. The three COB light source panels output flood light, large irradiation area, and can be rotated by 270°, suitable for a variety of work occasions.

Product Dimensions and Application Scenarios: work lights on stand main light size:8.26*2.8*2.4in,bracket measures 15*2.7 inches when retracted,bracket can be extended up to 36.4in,LED Head and bracket can be extended up to 44.6in,comes with a storage bag, easy to carry.Suitable for outdoor,camping,workshop,construction,shooting fill light,traveling,patio and so on!

name: 14000mAh Rechargeable Work Lights with Stand Camping Light Stand, Rechargeable Work Light Tripod Stand, 270° Adjustable White/Warm/Nature White Camping Lights Rechargeable
short_description: 【Powerful Brightness with Stepless Dimming】 Featuring 4X 2000 lumens at maximum brightness, this LED work light offers stepless dimming to adjust to your desired brightness level. With 5 lighting modes—Warm, White, Warm White, Fast SOS, and Slow SOS—you’ll have the perfect lighting for any situation. Adjust brightness freely using the +/- buttons, and switch between modes with the “M” button.

【Upgraded High-Capacity Battery】 Equipped with a 14,000mAh high-capacity battery, this rechargeable work light can operate for over 30 hours at the lowest brightness. [Attention] This work light uses a genuine 14,000mAh battery, requiring over 8 hours to fully recharge when depleted. Please allow adequate charging time.

【Adjustable Rotating Light Panels】 Designed with 4 LED lighting Panels, ChlorStar work light ensures better coverage. Each panel can be adjusted vertically up to 180° and horizontally up to 270°, allowing you to illuminate any corner with ease.

【Multi-Stage Adjustable Foldable Stand】 Comes with a tripod stand featuring three height adjusters on the main pole, reaching up to 79 inches when fully extended. The stand is foldable for easy transport and storage and can be adjusted to multiple heights to meet your needs. The portable work light is detachable from the stand for standalone use, offering maximum convenience.

【IP66 Waterproof Design】 The housing and connection components of the light head are built with IP66 waterproof technology, ensuring durability in wet environments. This LED work light with stand resists aging and damage, making it ideal for challenging conditions.

name: PARMIDA LED Dual-Head Work Light with Telescoping Tripod Stand Up to 6 Ft Tall, UL Approved Cable, Durable Metal Body, 10,000 Lumen, 100W, IP65 Waterproof, Rotating & Detachable Heads, 8 Ft Power Cord
